name: conceptualist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a style of art in which unusual and interesting ideas are more important than technical skill: He has become a leading figure of the conceptualist art world. Her work is full of conceptualist irony.
More examplesFewer examplesThe artist's conceptualist installation takes the audience on a fascinating philosophical journey.Conceptualist fashion turns the clothes we wear into an intellectual exercise.
an artist who creates art in a conceptualist style: The gallery was displaying a selection of works by a famous German conceptualist. Like many conceptualists, this artist specializes in controversy and confrontation.
More examplesFewer examplesThis looks like the work of some young conceptualist just out of art school.He was a leading conceptualist whose work became popular in the 1960s.
